file_content.text: Wait, please! You're with the settlement, right? You've got to stop stealing from this energy station!
I'm the foreman here. Fa'athra said if this keeps up, he'll execute my family!
What does Fa'athra care if I siphon off a little power?
That's insane.
Energy is the one thing Hutts don't waste. They take their power reserves very seriously.
I'm so sorry.
I didn't know the job would be like this.
Sounds to me like you're working for the wrong Hutt.
So? Change employers.
Ha. Nem'ro's no different. This is how Hutts do business.
Look, I'm sympathetic to these settlers, but I have to protect my family.
I need to find out who the settlers are trading with and shut him down.
I haven't met the settlers' contact. Don't even know his name.
I don't know anything.
I've got something here that'll give me all the answers I need.
What are you proposing?
Fa'athra didn't make me foreman here for nothing.
Pay me to care.
You'll get whatever the settlers offered for the power units. I won't mess up your deal.
I built this special power unit with a tracker inside. The tracker transmits its location from any place on Hutta.
If you give this power unit to the settlers, I can find the black market contact and stop him.
What exactly will happen to the black marketeer?
How will you do that?
I'll threaten to turn him over to Fa'athra if he doesn't stop trading with the settlers. That's all.
I can't betray my employers unless you offer me more.
Changing sides costs money.
My wife and children are all I've got.
So, I shouldn't tell the settlers about the tracker.
You want me to lie?
No! This has to stay a secret. If I don't get rid of the black market contact, my family dies.
You Fa'athra scum brought this on yourselves.
I don't care about you.
Please, I'm just trying to save my family!
Take the power unit with the tracker inside and give it to the settlers. I'm begging you!
I won't let your family die. Give me the tracker.
Fine, for your family.
Thank you! Once this black market contact stops trading with the settlers, everything will be alright.
Remember, you never saw me, and this conversation never happened.
Keep this a secret.
Don't tell anyone what a softie I am. I got a reputation to protect.
Keep this a secret.
Good luck.
I'm done with you.
You saved my family's life. Thank you.
Forget it. I won't betray my employers.
I work for the settlers.
It's because I'm human, isn't it? I should have known an alien wouldn't care!
Have to get my wife and kids... find a way out of here!
You... you heartless scum! I'll have to get my wife and kids out of here before Fa'athra finds out.
We don't have any credits saved up... no place to run... I don't know what I'm gonna do!
If you grab your family and start running now, you can hide in the swamps.
Flee.
Attack Fa'athra.
You'll probably all wind up rancor droppings.
Die.
I hope you die!
